about_the_game:
In this free demo of Abducted: The Night Hunters, you’ll experience the first moments of the alien invasion that forever changes the fate of Canela County. This game introduction is crafted to immerse you in the initial events of the invasion while teaching you basic gameplay mechanics.

Play for around an hour as the world around your character undergoes a dramatic shift. What begins as an ordinary day ends with a terrifying abduction at the hands of the Grays.

Key Features:

  • Duration: The introduction offers about 1 hour of gameplay.

  • Narrative Tutorial: Learn the main game mechanics without the stress of direct enemy encounters.

  • Story: Uncover the events that sparked the extraterrestrial invasion.

  • Immersive Setting: Dive into the tense and mysterious atmosphere of the hours leading up to the invasion.

Note: The demo does not include combat or the Night Hunt mode. To experience the full game and face the Grays, consider purchasing the complete version.

Play for around an hour as the world around your character undergoes a dramatic shift. What begins as an ordinary day ends with a terrifying abduction at the hands of the Grays.

  • Story: Uncover the events that sparked the extraterrestrial invasion.

Note: The demo does not include combat or the Night Hunt mode. To experience the full game and face the Grays, consider purchasing the complete version.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 - 5th Generation or more
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 - 8th Generation or more
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 2060
  • Storage: 12 GB available space

short_description: Discover the beginning of the alien invasion in this exciting narrative DEMO that serves as both an introduction and tutorial for Abducted: The Night Hunters. Survive the first night!
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
